purpose: Comprehensive design system for Sprintwise. Use this file as the single source of truth when building new features. Follow all specifications exactly to maintain visual consistency.
tailwindConfigReference: Colors, shadows, and border-radius are defined in tailwind.config.ts. Use the semantic class names (e.g., bg-accent-primary, text-text-secondary) rather than raw hex values.

highLevel: Warmth & Approachability — Warm palette, soft rounded forms, inviting feel
Clarity & Simplicity — Minimalist, ample whitespace, clear hierarchy
Consistency — Uniform styling for all interactive elements across screens
Focus on Content — Design supports readability without distraction
Subtle Depth — Soft shadows only; avoid strong skeuomorphism
Smart Simplicity — Every element serves a purpose; calm and efficient
designPrinciples.style: Modern, friendly flat design with subtle depth. Warm pastel accents on cream canvas. Rounded corners dominate. Professional yet approachable.

primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active nav, progress fill, main actions

peach.usage: Hero sections, warm highlights, info callouts (use /20 or /40 for tints)

pageLayout.contentMaxWidth: max-w-4xl or max-w-5xl or max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4

nav.link: px-3 py-2 rounded-design-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors

buttonPrimary.base: px-6 py-3 bg-accent-primary text-white rounded-design-md font-bold hover:opacity-90 transition-opacity

buttonSecondary.base: px-6 py-3 border-2 border-border-medium text-text-primary rounded-design-md font-semibold hover:bg-white/60 transition-colors

buttonBack.base: px-6 py-2 border-2 border-border-medium rounded-design-md font-semibold text-text-primary hover:bg-canvas disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-colors

chipSelected.base: bg-accent-coral text-white rounded-design-md px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium

chipUnselected.base: bg-canvas text-text-secondary hover:bg-border-light border border-border-light rounded-design-md px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium

chipToggleSelected.base: bg-accent-primary/20 text-accent-primary font-medium rounded-design-sm px-2 py-1 text-sm

input.base: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-border-light rounded-design-sm bg-white text-text-primary placeholder:text-text-tertiary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent-primary focus:border-accent-primary outline-none

textarea.base: w-full px-4 py-2 border border-border-light rounded-design-sm bg-white text-text-primary placeholder:text-text-tertiary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent-primary outline-none

card.base: bg-white rounded-design-xl shadow-soft-md border border-border-light p-8

stepNumber.base: w-6 h-6 rounded-full bg-accent-primary text-white flex items-center justify-center text-sm
stepNumber.large: w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-accent-primary text-white flex items-center justify-center text-xl font-bold

dayCard.active: aspect-square border-2 rounded-design-md p-2 border-accent-primary/30 bg-white
dayCard.rest: aspect-square border-2 rounded-design-md p-2 border-border-light bg-canvas

listItemDay.base: border border-border-light rounded-design-lg p-4 hover:border-accent-primary/30 transition-colors
listItemDay.dayBadge: w-8 h-8 bg-accent-primary text-white rounded-full font-semibold text-sm

loadingSpinner.base: animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-2 border-border-light border-t-accent-primary

pageSpecificPatterns.heroSection: bg-accent-peach/30 border-b border-border-light py-20 sm:py-28 text-center
pageSpecificPatterns.featureCard: flex flex-col items-center text-center p-6 rounded-design-xl bg-canvas border border-border-light

printStyles.note: Use no-print and data-print-hide to hide UI from print. Use print-bw class for B&W print variant. Print uses minimal B&W styling.

aiChecklist: Use semantic Tailwind classes: bg-accent-primary, text-text-secondary, border-border-light, etc.
Use design radius: rounded-design-sm, rounded-design-md, rounded-design-lg, rounded-design-xl, rounded-design-2xl
Primary actions: bg-accent-primary with white text
Selected state: bg-accent-coral for chips, border-accent-primary bg-accent-primary/10 for cards
Info callouts: bg-accent-peach/20 border-accent-peach/40 or bg-accent-primary/10 border-accent-primary/30
Labels: block text-sm font-medium mb-2 text-text-primary
Cards: bg-white with border-border-light and shadow-soft-md
Spacing: Use space-y-6 for form groups, gap-4 for button groups
Font: font-sans (Poppins) is default; use font-bold for headings, font-semibold for subheadings
